channel.title: WhatsApp Business API Status
channel.description: Status updates for WhatsApp Business API

item.title: [Major disruptions]: On-Premises Solution
item.guid: On-Premises Solution update at: Tue, 25 Oct 2022 08:09:34 GMT
item.description: We are aware of major disruptions impacting the ability to send messages via the WhatsApp Business Platform. Our teams are working to mitigate the issue.

item.title: [Resolved]: Cloud API
item.guid: Cloud API update at: Mon, 24 Oct 2022 23:52:00 GMT
item.description: The issue impacting send media messages has been mitigated.

item.title: [Major disruptions]: Cloud API
item.guid: Cloud API update at: Tue, 25 Oct 2022 08:01:21 GMT
item.description: We are aware of major disruptions impacting the ability to send messages via the WhatsApp Business Platform. Our teams are working to mitigate the issue.
